name: 3 tips to create a large set of text styles in Figma fast
description:
Inspiration - Tailwindcss

Create text styles on

  • Font size
  • Font weight
  • Line height

Figure out a process


Problem

If you had to create these text styles one by one, it could take a lot of time.

I could just duplicate any design system file, but what if you are curious or need to create one with a specific naming convention and styles?


Process

Create styles

  • Naming convention
  • Do different sizes, line-heights and weights
  • Auto layout to organise
  • Duplicate set

Rename text with plugin Change Text

Generate styles with plugin Styler

Celebrate
